meanings.definition: A synthetic element with the symbol Mt and atomic number 109.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study meitnerium to learn more about synthetic elements.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes meitnerium as a synthetic element.
meanings.sent3: When the meitnerium joined the party, things got a little more scientific.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a complex puzzle, each thought a piece of meitnerium waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The laboratory was filled with excitement as they successfully synthesized meitnerium.
